javadoc:
Service that provides a Language given a name, and 
 information about the language.

methods.name: getLanguage
methods.comment:
Returns a specific language version with the given language ID.
 This form should only be used when handling language upgrade concerns.

params.name: languageID
params.comment: the ID of language to retrieve.

throws.comment:
if the specified language version can not be found 
 for the given ID.

methods.name: getLanguageDescription
methods.comment:
Get language information for a specific version of the given language ID.
 This form should only be used when handling language upgrade concerns.

throws.comment: if there is no language for the given ID.

return.comment: language information for the given language ID.

name: VersionedLanguageService
comment:
Service that provides a Language given a name, and 
 information about the language.
